mapper.select: SELECT A.PLACE_ID , A.PLACE_NM , A.PLACE_OUTLINE , A.PLACE_DESC , A.PLACE_FAC_INFO , A.RPSNT_IMAGE_URL , A.PLACE_LAT , A.PLACE_LNG , A.PLACE_LOCT_CD1 , A.PLACE_LOCT_CD2 , (SELECT CD_NM FROM CODE_TB WHERE CD = A.PLACE_LOCT_CD1) AS LARGE_LOCATION , (SELECT CD_NM FROM CODE_TB WHERE CD = A.PLACE_LOCT_CD2) AS SMALL_LOCATION FROM PLACE01_TB A WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.PLACE_ID = #{placeId}

SELECT A.PLACE_ID , A.PLACE_NM , A.PLACE_OUTLINE , A.PLACE_DESC , A.PLACE_FAC_INFO , A.RPSNT_IMAGE_URL , A.PLACE_LAT , A.PLACE_LNG , A.PLACE_LOCT_CD1 , A.PLACE_LOCT_CD2 , (SELECT CD_NM FROM CODE_TB WHERE CD = A.PLACE_LOCT_CD1) AS LARGE_LOCATION , (SELECT CD_NM FROM CODE_TB WHERE CD = A.PLACE_LOCT_CD2) AS SMALL_LOCATION FROM PLACE01_TB A WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.STATE = '1'

SELECT SEQ_NO , (SELECT CD_NM FROM CODE_TB WHERE CD = A.LARGE_CATEGORY_CD) AS LARGE_CATEGORY , (SELECT CD_NM FROM CODE_TB WHERE CD = A.SMALL_CATEGORY_CD) AS SMALL_CATEGORY FROM PLACE02_TB A WHERE A.PLACE_ID = #{placeId}
